name: Wreck the Party: Christmas Edition
description:
‘Tis the season to gather with loved ones and eat as much fruitcake as possible. What’s that? No one likes fruitcake? Fruitcake wasn’t invited to this party? You think fruitcake should leave right now?

Well Fruitcake hears you, but thinks you should give it a shot. What's the worst that could happen? Let's find out together!

Help this nutty fruitcake slingshot its way into the hearts (and stomachs) of guests.

  • 50 unique challenges
  • Over 100 lines of voiced dialog
  • Funny cartoon physics
  • Lots of surprises hidden around the game!

If you enjoy this game, be sure to check out Wreck the Party: Thanksgiving Edition.
